archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.1.7: Details about information security incidents experienced (e.g. incident type and category, information affected and events leading up to incidents) should be recorded and maintained on a continuous basis, using a consistent approach (e.g. using an agreed taxonomy).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
